name: node-sass-package-importer
description: Custom importer for node-sass to import packages from the `node_modules` directory

0.0.1.name: node-sass-package-importer
0.0.1.description: Custom importer for node-sass to import packages from node_modules or bower_components directories

scripts.scripts:bundle: rollup --config --format cjs --output dist/index.js js/index.js
scripts.scripts: npm run scripts:lint && npm run scripts:bundle

0.0.2.name: node-sass-package-importer
0.0.2.description: Custom importer for node-sass to import packages from the `node_modules` directory

scripts.scripts:bundle: rollup --config --format cjs --output dist/index.js js/index.js && rollup --config --format cjs --output dist/PackageImporter.js js/lib/PackageImporter.js
scripts.scripts: npm run scripts:lint && npm run scripts:bundle
